details.script_description: The script runs a series of experiments for pruning a ResNet20 model on the CIFAR10 dataset using different pruning methods and hyperparameters. It uses LSF (Load Sharing Facility) for job submission and resource allocation. The script iterates through various pruning methods, target sparsity values, seeds, modules to prune, Fisher subsample sizes, and mini-batch sizes. It executes a Python script (main.py) for each combination of parameters. The script logs the results to files in specified directories and uses various command line arguments to configure the experiment.
